extDescription.message: garlic forwards your request to .onion and .exit domains, creating an effective Tor proxy.

not_configured.description: garlic is not currently configured and will not work! Please see the "Settings" tab to configure!
not_configured.message: garlic is not currently configured and will not work! Please see the "Settings" tab to configure!

useLocal.message: The Tor SOCKS server is running on another machine:

about_top.description: garlic is a tor proxy handler that can make accessing your favorite .onion sites through your favorite browser simple - however, you should not expect added security/privacy from using it.
about_top.message: garlic is a tor proxy handler that can make accessing your favorite .onion sites through your favorite browser simple - however, you should not expect added security/privacy from using it.

about_mid.message: If you are using garlic for privacy, I highly recommend getting the Tor Browser instead. It is a lot more secure as it does other stuff to protect your privacy. garlic is only intended for letting you access onion sites - it doesn't grant any additional security guarantees.
